! > Name of the colorer
! Color code (RGB) - 1 
! Color code (RGB) - 1 
! Color code (RGB) - â€¦
!
! EDIT WITH CAUTION (At least three lines are required for each block starting with >)
! At least one blank line must be inserted between two blocks
! ONLY USE DIGITS BETWEEN 0 AND 1 TO DEFINE THE RGB COLORS
!

> X-Original (2)
0.3 	0 	0.3
0.3 	1 	0.3


> X-Bred (2)
0     0     	1
1     0     	0


> X-Greyl (2)
0    	0.5   	0
1    	1    	0


> X-Pinor (2)
0.8	0	0.8
1	0.5	0


> X-Shicy (2)
0.7	0.5	0
0	1	1


> X-Jet (4)
0     0     1
0     1     1
1     1     0
1     0     0
